alert.note: Alert for Grays Harbor; Thurston (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 07 at 8:03AM PST until December 08 at 1:47AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Washington... Snoqualmie River Near Carnation affecting King County. Chehalis River Above Grand Mound affecting Thurston and Grays Harbor Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Washington... Chehalis River At Porter affecting Grays Harbor County. .Light rain will continue to move over the region today but is not expected to impact flood levels. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chehalis River above Grand Mound. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 141.0 feet, the Chehalis River in Thurston County will flood several roads in Independence Valley including James Road, Independence Road, and Moon road. Flood waters will also cover nearby farm lands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM PST Thursday the stage was 142.1 feet. - Flood stage is 141.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 AM PST Thursday was 142.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this afternoon at 415 PM PST.
